SEARCH
Package net.zypr.menuAPI.implementation

Class AbstractMenu

java.lang.Object
net.zypr.menuAPI.implementation.AbstractMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleMenu
public abstract class AbstractMenu extends Object implements Menu
An abstract implementation of the Menu interface. Provides a base structure for creating custom menus with item click handling and toggle item functionality.

    • setToggleItem

      public void setToggleItem(int slot, boolean initialState, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack onItem, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack offItem, MenuToggleHandler handler)
      Sets a toggleable item in the specified slot. The item toggles between two states (on/off) based on player interaction.
      Specified by:
      setToggleItem in interface Menu
      Parameters:
      slot - the slot index to set the toggle item
      initialState - the initial state of the toggle
      onItem - the item representing the "on" state
      offItem - the item representing the "off" state
      handler - the toggle handler to handle state changes
